mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_pwd, enabled, user_name, user_email, profile_img, nickname, introduce, blame_count) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, 1, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, 'A', #{nickname}, #{introduce}, #{blame_count})
insert into skill(skill_seq, user_id, skill_name, skill_level) values(#{skill_seq}, #{user_id}, #{skill_name}, #{skill_level})
